section.title: Industry Mega Trends
section.subtitle: Explore the key trends shaping the future of technology and business

trends.title: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
trends.content: AI and ML are transforming how businesses operate, enabling predictive analytics, automation, and intelligent decision-making across industries. From healthcare diagnostics to financial fraud detection, these technologies are becoming essential for competitive advantage.

trends.title: Cloud-First Infrastructure
trends.content: Organizations are adopting cloud-first strategies to achieve scalability, flexibility, and cost efficiency. Multi-cloud and hybrid cloud architectures are becoming the norm, enabling businesses to leverage the best services from different providers.

trends.title: Edge Computing Revolution
trends.content: Edge computing is bringing processing power closer to data sources, reducing latency and enabling real-time applications. This trend is crucial for IoT devices, autonomous vehicles, and applications requiring instant response times.

trends.title: Cybersecurity Evolution
trends.content: As digital transformation accelerates, cybersecurity is evolving beyond traditional perimeter defense to zero-trust architectures, AI-powered threat detection, and comprehensive data protection strategies.

trends.title: Sustainable Technology
trends.content: Green technology and sustainable computing practices are gaining prominence. Organizations are focusing on energy-efficient solutions, carbon-neutral operations, and environmentally responsible technology choices.

trends.title: Low-Code/No-Code Platforms
trends.content: The democratization of software development through low-code and no-code platforms is enabling non-technical users to create applications, accelerating digital transformation and reducing development costs.
